name: hugo_site
description: This is the repository from which the [Hugo](https://gohugo.io)-generated version of [www.brycewray.com](https://www.brycewray.com/) is built.

scripts.dev:hugo: npm run install:hugo && exec-bin bin/hugo/hugo server --port 3000 --bind=0.0.0.0 --baseURL=http://192.168.254.10:3000 --panicOnWarning --disableFastRender --forceSyncStatic --gc
scripts.prod:host: npm run build && mv public/posts/index.xml public/index-excerpts.xml && npm run pagefind
scripts.testbuild:hugo: npm run install:hugo && npm run dev:hugo -- --minify --environment=production
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean clean:$npm_package_config_theme style-exe:$npm_package_config_theme --parallel dev:hugo style-dev:$npm_package_config_theme
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:$npm_package_config_theme style-exe:$npm_package_config_theme style-prod:$npm_package_config_theme prod:hugo
scripts.testbuild: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:$npm_package_config_theme style-exe:$npm_package_config_theme --parallel testbuild:hugo style-testbuild:$npm_package_config_theme

author: Bryce Wray
